item.title: Dhaka University admission tests start Nov 28 for 2025-26 session
item.description: Dhaka University has announced the schedule for admission application and exams for the 2025–2026 Academic Session, setting Nov 28 for the start of the tests. According to a notice on Monday, applications for admission will begin on Oct 29 and continue until 11:59 pm on Nov 16. The notice,

item.title: Garment workers stages demo to press home 9-point demand
item.description: The workers of a garment factory in Konabari area of Gazipur staged demonstrations in front of the factory to press-home their nine-point demand including payment of their salary within 7-10 days of a month. Quoting witnesses, Morshed Zaman, inspector of Gazipur Industrial Police (Konabari zone) s

item.title: Pubali Bank donates two buses to BUET
item.description: As a part of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR), the Board of Directors of Pubali Bank PLC donated two buses to Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology (BUET), according to a press release. Mohammad Ali, Managing Director and CEO of Pubali Bank PLC, handed over the key to Professor

item.title: Fishing ban hits poor fishermen hard, study finds
item.description: As much as 56 per cent of small-scale fishers remain excluded from government aid during the annual fishing ban, pushing 70 per cent to take informal and exploitative loans, said a new study on Monday. The situation often forces marginalised communities to fish illegally for survival, the study ad

item.title: Al-Arafah Islami Bank signs agreement with ACI Godrej Agrovet
item.description: A Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) has been signed between Al Arafah Islami Bank, the country’s leading Sharia-compliant bank, and ACI Godrej Agrovet Private Limited. Under the agreement, ACI Godrej will collect sales prices from its distributors through the bank’s branches, sub-branch

item.title: NCC Bank launches its 1st Annual Sustainability Report 2024
item.description: NCC Bank officially launched its 1st Annual Sustainability Report 2024 during an “Awareness Building Program on Sustainable Finance” organized by the bank, according to a press release. The report, prepared by prioritizing Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) issues, is expected

item.title: BRAC Bank inaugurates new branch in Nikunja
item.description: BRAC Bank has inaugurated a new branch at Nikunja, Dhaka, to provide the best-in-class services and a delightful banking experience to its valued customers. BRAC Bank’s Managing Director & CEO Tareq Refat Ullah Khan formally inaugurated the branch at Asian Tower in Joar Sahara Commercial Are

item.title: 2,000 police, 12 RAB units, 6 BGB platoons for RUCSU polls
item.description: The Rajshahi University Central Students’ Union (RUCSU), Senate student representative and hall union elections will be conducted under tight security. At a coordination meeting on Monday afternoon, Rajshahi Metropolitan Police Commissioner Mohammad Abu Sufian said for the polls, 2,000 polic

item.title: US is ready for deal with Iran when Tehran is, Trump says
item.description: The United States is prepared to make a deal with Iran when Tehran is ready, US President Donald Trump said in a speech to the Israeli parliament on Monday.
